name: 陳生明
objective: 生物電化學可以獲得更多先進的訊息，其中包括生化反應、形態學，以及物理、化學和電學等相關性質。運用相關的技術方法，例如電化學工具，可用以研究異相與均相反應，亦可獲得諸多界面間的化學活性和圖譜以利用於微裝置的發展。對生物分析而言，生物電化學感測器具有最大的再現性，並能夠成功的引用於電活性生化物種、母體材料，以及其規格上。生物電分析方法包括最先進和有用的方法，其中大部分皆建立在此領域的的基礎上。
schedule:
First week : The Origin of Bioelectrochemistry: An Overview
Second week : Voltammetry of Proteins and Single Cell Electrochemical
Third week : Bioelectroonics and Electrochemistry of NAD(P)+/NAD(P)H
Fourth week : Electrochemical Immunoassay
Fifth week : Electrochemistry of Metalloporphyrins in Nonaqueous Media and Aqueous Media
Sixth week : Electrochemical Measurements of NO, Nitric Oxide, CO in Biological Systems
Seventh week : Scanning Electrochemical Microscopy Applied to Biological Systems
Eighth week : Midterm exam
Ninth week : Ion-Selective Electrodes for Measurements in Biological Fluids and Biomolecules
Tenth week : Electrochemistry in Bioanalysis and drug determination 
Eleventh week : Interfacial Properties of ProteinSpectroelectchemical Studies
Twelfth week : Electrochemical Analysis of Nucleic Acids
Thirteenth week : Enzyme Electrodes, Enzyme Electrochemistry, Direct Electrochemistry
Fourteenth week : Carbon Fiber Microelectrodes for the in vivo Measurement of Neurotransmitters:A Close Up Look at Neurochemical Activity in the Brain
Fifteenth week : Potentiometric Measurements of Protenins
Sixteenth week : Membrane Electrochemistry
Seventeenth week : Mediated Electron-transfer between Redox-enzymes and Electrode Supports
Eighteenth week : Final exam.
